      • getAllAvaibleVoices

        public Collection<Voice> getAllAvaibleVoices(net.sf.saxon.s9api.Processor saxonProcessor)
        Return the list of available voices. The SSML adapters and the engines are not checked, so it might be the case that some of the returned voices are actually not usable.
        Parameters:
        params - include TTS properties such as server IPs.
        Returns:
